detail_desc: Knee-length dressing gown in soft pile with a hood, pockets, and a detachable tie belt at the waist.
Top in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Dungaree shorts in a soft viscose weave with frill-trimmed adjustable straps and elastication at the back of the waist. Gathered hems with narrow elastication and a flounced trim. Cotton lining.
Fully lined swimsuit with a text print on the front, racer back and cut-out section at the back.
Hipster briefs in stretch fabric with a mid waist, lined gusset, wide sides and medium coverage at the back. Seamless.
Pencil case with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 5x6x20 cm.
Playsuit in a crêpe weave with a V-neck, sewn-in wrapover at the front and short, wide sleeves. Seam and detachable tie belt at the waist, a concealed zip at the back and side pockets. Unlined.
Sports armband with a touchscreen window for smartphones, adjustable hook and loop fastening and earphone outlet at the top and bottom. Fits smartphones up to 7x14 cm in size.
V-neck top in sweatshirt fabric with flock-print stripes on the sleeves, striped ribbing around the neckline, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside..
Round-necked, straight-cut T-shirt in soft premium cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Short, wide dress in airy, crinkled fabric with a flounce around the neckline and down the front. V-shaped opening with narrow ties at the neckline, dropped shoulders and long, slightly wider sleeves with a drawstring and frill trim at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist for added width. Sewn-in, V-neck underdress in jersey with adjustable shoulder straps. The polyester content of the underdress is recycled.
Vest top in soft ribbed jersey made from Tencel™ lyocell with a V-neck front and back.
Straight-cut, single-breasted jacket in woven fabric with narrow notch lapels, jetted front pockets with a flap, long sleeves with decorative buttons at the cuffs, and a single back vent. Lined.
Leggings in extra sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted lenses. UV-protective.
Short dress in a sturdy rib knit containing some wool with a deep V-neck and long, voluminous balloon sleeves. Wide fitting at the top with a fitted waist and skirt.
CONSCIOUS Joggers in organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and ribbed hems.

All-in-one suit in soft pile. Hood with ears and a zip down the front that has a chin guard at the top and continues down one leg. Opening mitts at the cuffs that can be folded over to keep the hands warm. Jersey lining.
Joggers in a soft knit with cable-knit sections, an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and wide ribbing at the hems.
Top in soft velour with long raglan sleeves and short slits at the hem.

Short, straight-cut dress in satin with an opening and button at the back of the neck, and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuffs. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
Top and skirt in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Top with 3/4-length sleeves. Short, bell-shaped skirt with smocking at the waist.
Short, fitted dress in a stretch weave with a V-neck, short cap sleeves, a concealed zip down the back and a slit at the back of the hem. Lined.
Small weekend bag in woven fabric with a zip and two handles at the top, an adjustable shoulder strap and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size 12x35x42 cm.
Round-necked, long-sleeved top in stretch, cotton-blend jersey. Slim fit.
Fine-knit socks with a scalloped edge.

Sunglasses with metal frames, plastic sidepieces and UV-protective, polarised lenses. Polarised lenses convey colours more clearly and provide stronger contrasts while preventing glare. Supplied in a drawstring fabric pouch.

LIMITED EDITION. Jumpsuit in a cupro and viscose weave with a slight sheen. Small stand-up collar, a V-neck with pleats at the front, a concealed zip at the back and pockets in the side seams. Looser fit at the top, long dolman sleeves and wide, close-fitting cuffs with a slit and covered buttons. Wide drawstring at the waist that ties at one side, a low crotch, and straight, wide legs. Unlined.
Top in soft viscose jersey with double spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Slightly shorter jumper in a soft, fine knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Brazilian briefs in cotton jersey and lace with a low waist, lined gusset and half-string back.

Shirt in a checked cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton and recycled polyester blend with a soft brushed inside. Jersey-lined hood, a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Dress with a lightweight sweatshirt fabric top, and skirt in a cotton weave. Print motif on the front, short sleeves with a frill trim and a lined skirt with a scalloped, broderie anglaise hem.
Two-strand necklace of metal chains in different designs, one with a pendant. Adjustable length.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut, sleeveless V-neck blouse in a crêpe weave with flounces at the front.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and mesh-lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide elastic hem, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Trousers in sturdy jersey with a high, elasticated waist and straight-cut legs that taper to the hem with contrasting colour lace stripes down the sides.
Tunic in a viscose weave with a V-neck, short, wide raglan sleeves, a narrow, detachable tie belt and gathered tiers to the hem.
Jumper in a soft rib knit with a turtle neck and long raglan sleeves.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Top in ribbed jersey with overlocked edges and long sleeves with a double flounce at the cuffs.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and front pockets.
Short-sleeved top in airy jersey made from recycled polyester with narrow elastication and a wide flounce at the top. Can be worn as an off-the-shoulder top.
Hair elastic with plastic beads.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif, buttons on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, small embroidered detail on the chest and short sleeves with narrow ribbed trims. Slits at the hem.

Shirt in jacquard-weave premium cotton with a full spread collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Set with a top in sweatshirt fabric and pair of pull-on trousers in woven fabric. Top with a print motif and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and elasticated hems.
Slides with a braided jute trim around the soles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Dungaree dress in soft cotton corduroy. Adjustable straps with a metal fastener, elastication at the sides of the waist and gathered tiers on the skirt for added width and soft draping. Partly lined.
Loose-fitting, V-neck T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Blouse in a crêpe weave with concealed buttons down the front and a collar with detachable ties. Yoke with a pleat at the back, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Cropped off-the-shoulder top in soft fabric with smocking at the top and hem, and long wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs.
Lace skirt with concealed elastication at the waist, a gathered seam at the hips and a scalloped, crocheted trim at the hem. Lined.
Tailored, ankle-length trousers in stretch fabric with a zip fly and concealed hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets, fake back pockets and gently flared legs.
Cardigan in a soft, lace knit with a round neck and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
T-shirts in soft cotton jersey with narrow ribbing around the neckline. Press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a skirt in a double layer of glittery tulle.
Ankle-length trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a fake fly and tapered legs with creases and a slit at the hems. Wide ribbing at the waist for best fit.

Pyjamas in a soft cotton blend. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric in a longer style with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Leggings in soft, patterned jersey with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a low waist, lined gusset, low-cut legs and full coverage at the back. Wide elastication at the waist.

Padded parka with a pile-lined, drawstring hood with a faux fur trim. Zip and wind flap with buttons down the front and a concealed drawstring at the waist. Handwarmer pockets with press-studs, flap front pockets with a press-stud and a small zipped pocket on one sleeve. Inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.
Short, fitted top in ribbed jersey.
Hat in a soft rib knit with a fold-up hem.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey with a sheen. Narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, and a heavily draping pleated skirt with a raw-edge hem. Lined at the top.
Platform sandals in imitation leather with covered heels and an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather insoles.
Boys’ briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined front.
Fancy dress masks in plastic foam with two elastic straps at the back.
Sports socks in fast-drying functional yarn with reinforced heels and toes for optimum fit and comfort. Ventilating hole-knit sections over the feet.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and viscose blend with long sleeves, a V-neck at the back with a horizontal strap at the back of the neck, and a decorative lace trim at the hem.
Six metal ear cuffs in various designs. Can be worn on non-pierced ears.
Short shorts in a viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and gently rounded hems with short slits in the sides.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with sequins on the front and narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
